name: SuperMallHaul
description:
(DISCLAIMER) THIS IS MY FIRST GAME

This Is a fun game about going to the store 2 minutes before closing time and getting as many items as possible. This game is not fully finished, I may update it and add levels, fix bugs etc but I may not.

THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2021.2 THE THEME WAS LET THERE BE CHAOS How to install
  1. Download 
  2. Unzip the file(if you dont know how to do that look up "how to unzip file"
  3. Double click to open the folder
  4. Double click on ShoppingMallHaul.exe run the game
  5. You should now be playing
  6. Every time you want to play double click ShoppingMallHaul.exe to run the game

Sorry theres no WebGL (its what lets you play in browser) I uploaded this at 1:34 am , the Game Jam was ending in 3 hours and WebGL was not working so I gave up and made it a download. I may add WebGL in the future

YOU HAVE TO CLICK ON THE ITEMS TO PICK THEM UP KNOWN BUGS
  1. The options menu in main menu and in the game dont sync. Both still work theyjust dont display the same thing
  2. Sometimes the game freezes while loading to fix just click escape then your mouse to get back in
  3. If your in the pause menu and click escape to resume it wont lock your cursor so you have to click the resume button

Sorry for all the bugs but this is my first game and it was made in a week also feel free to inform me of other bugs in the comments.

Thats about I hope you enjoy this kinda scuffed game and feel free to leave a comment.

btw theres no Mac download cause I did not have time to put it up, there will be one after the jam is over

The music in the main menu was free
